text: Charles Simms (January 24, 1928 - October 10, 2003) was an American gymnast. He competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics and the 1956 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2003 deaths Category:American male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of the United States Category:Gymnasts at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts at the 1956 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from New York City
title: Charles Simms (gymnast)
